Article.ArticleTitle: Research across multiple disciplines to respond to health shocks.

Abstract.AbstractText: Research that spans clinical specialties and research disciplines beyond health and healthcare is a priority for planning equitable responses to manage future health shocks, argue Amitava Banerjee and colleagues
